sources.name: Union Density via Quality of Government (QoG) dataset 2017
sources.dataPublisherSource: J. Visser, ICTWSS Data base. version 5.1. Amsterdam: Amsterdam Institute for Advanced Labour Studies (AIAS), University of Amsterdam. September 2016.

fields.name: Union density rate (Quality of Government (QoG) (2017))
fields.description: Net union membership as a proportion of wage and salary earners in employment (WSEE). It is calculated as Num*100/WSEE.
